member_organisations:
List of our organization can be found on the right-hand side. 
 
http://www.ceplis.org/en/index.php
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Single market, Public Health, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Our organization is currently interested in the "Proportionality Test" and other issues regarding the proposed Services Package from the Commission.
organisation_name: European Council of the Liberal Professions (CEPLIS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
CEPLIS has a partnership with Eurocadres, one of the largest trade unions in Europe 
 
http://www.eurocadres.eu/our-positions/eurocadres-ceplis-joint-position-on-the-service-package/
relevant_communication:
- CEPLIS organized a breakfast event at the European Parliament for the members of the SME Intergroup to discuss the Proportionality Test and other issues of the Services Package regarding the Liberal Professions. 
-Our organization puts out a bi-weekly Newsletter for our members announcing news and events that are relevant to Liberal Professions. 
-Our organization founded the Centre of Excellence for Professional Ethics in Malta.  
-CEPLIS put out a statement and an opinion regarding the Commission's proposed Services Packages and the Proportionality Test.  
-CEPLIS holds two General Assemblees a year, gathering from the European Commission, MEP's, and representatives of many professional associations across Europe.
